facultyName: Faculty of Engineering, Environment and Computing
description: Online option for this course available!In a world where simultaneous and dynamic emergencies are the new normal, individuals and organisations face ever more challenging situations. Standards in the sector are high but they need to be higher; employers are now demanding that emergency management practitioners are trained, qualified and accountable.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
